attributes.action: Emile Heskey for next England football manager
attributes.additional_details: Following the recent resignation of Fabio Capello as mamager of the England football team, we would like to see an English coach next. Heskey has been an integral part of the England set up for over a decade, and has all the credentials needed for this 'impossible' job. Mr Heskey's skills are unrivalled and players draw imspiration from this. It is important to have a coach with the knowledge, understanding and most of all ability needed in the English game. HESKEY FOR ENGLAND!

rejection.details: This is a mattrer for the FA.
